meanings.definition: A type of cheese made from sheep's milk.
meanings.sent1: I love to sprinkle fetas on my salad for a delicious flavor.
meanings.sent2: The grocery store had a sale on fetas, so I bought a block to try.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous mouse snuck into the kitchen and nibbled on the fetas, leaving a tiny bite mark.
meanings.sent4: The fetas on the plate looked like little white clouds waiting to be savored.
meanings.sent5: The creamy texture of the fetas melted in my mouth, leaving a rich taste behind.
